display_information.name: SMS Salesforce Integration
display_information.description: Send and receive SMS messages with Salesforce logging
display_information.long_description: A powerful Slack app that enables SMS communication with customers and Salesforce logging. Features include: Send and receive SMS messages via Twilio, Organized conversation threads for each phone number, Direct thread replies (no slash commands needed), Quick Reply buttons for longer messages, One-click Salesforce logging as Cases, Real-time conversation synchronization
